caption:
Did you know that Rogers Pass National Historic Site is rich in railway history? 🚂 Hike along the abandoned Canadian Pacific Railway line that in 1885 sliced through the Selkirk Mountains and connected a nation from coast-to-coast.
📷: @cormacm
